{"id":396362762,"lang":"cpp","time":"1 year, 7 months","timestamp":1600222853,"status_display":"Accepted","runtime":"284 ms","url":"/submissions/detail/396362762/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Valid Palindrome II","memory":"19.8 MB","code":"class Solution {\npublic:\n    bool validPalindrome(string s) {\n        \n        \n        // int L = 0; \n        // int R = s.length() - 1; \n        function<bool(int,int,bool)> ispal = [&](int L, int R, bool skipped) -> bool {\n            while(L < R) {\n                if (s[L] != s[R]) {\n                    if (skipped) {\n                        return false; \n                    }\n                    return ispal(L + 1, R, true) || ispal(L, R - 1, true); \n                } else {\n                    ++L; \n                    --R; \n                }\n            }\n            return true; \n        };\n        \n        return ispal(0, s.length() - 1, false); \n    }\n};","compare_result":"","title_slug":"valid-palindrome-ii"}
